message.content:
1. The study examined the efficacy of a commercially available, portion-controlled diet.
2. The portion-controlled diet was tested on obese patients.
3. The patients involved in the study had type 2 diabetes.
4. The study monitored changes in body weight.
5. The study monitored changes in HbA1c levels.
6. The duration of the study was 6 months.

messages.content:
Statement: This study examined the efficacy of a commercially available, portion-controlled diet (PCD) on body weight and HbA1c over 6 months in obese patients with type 2 diabetes.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
